name: JSON Font Project File
summary: A JFPROJ file is a font project created by Microsoft Font Maker, a font authoring program for Windows. It contains a font based on the penmanship of a user recorded from a connected electronic pen device. JFPROJ files include the glyphs that make up the alphabet and other symbols, several sentences written by the user, and information about the space between characters and words and the size of the font.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
